snippet: North and South Korea ended talks without an agreement Wednesday, casting doubt on prospects for reunions of families separated during the Korean War.
abstract: Unusual high-level dialogue between North and South Korea ends without agreement, casting doubt on prospects for reunions of families separated in the Korean War that the two Koreas have planned to hold in late Feb 2014.
lead_paragraph: North and South Korea ended talks without an agreement Wednesday, casting doubt on prospects for reunions of families separated during the Korean War.

headline.main: High-Level Talks Between Koreas End Without an Agreement
headline.print_headline: High-Level Talks Between Koreas End Without an Agreement
